tika-vin10t1:8_0: Sasikkho sādiyanto so, ṭhapetvā kiriyaṁ cuto.
tika-vin10t1:59_0: Nimittaṁ itthiyā tassa, chupato garukaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:85_0: Apade ahayo macchā, kapotā dvipadepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:130_0: Tatthajātakakaṭṭhaṁ vā, lataṁ vā chindato pana;
tika-vin10t1:133_0: Pathaviṁ khaṇato vāpi, byūhato paṁsumeva vā;
tika-vin10t1:134_0: Āmasantassa vā kumbhiṁ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:142_0: Uddharantassa khāṇuṁ vā, chindato saṅkhalimpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:143_0: Thullaccayaṁ tato kumbhiṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:145_0: Paṭhamaṁ pana kumbhiṁ vā, uddharitvā tathā puna;
tika-vin10t1:146_0: Ṭhānā cāveti khāṇuṁ vā, saṅkhaliṁ vāpi so nayo.
tika-vin10t1:148_0: Ito cito ca ghaṁsanto, mūle sāreti rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:151_0: Jātaṁ chindati ce rukkhaṁ, dukkaṭaṁ kumbhimatthake;
tika-vin10t1:157_0: Haranto kumbhiyā bhaṇḍaṁ, muṭṭhiṁ chindati attano;
tika-vin10t1:158_0: Bhājane vā gataṁ katvā, hoti bhikkhu parājito.
tika-vin10t1:160_0: Hāraṁ vā pana pāmaṅgaṁ, suttāruḷhaṁ tu kumbhiyā;
tika-vin10t1:161_0: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:167_0: Sakalampi ca taṁ kumbhiṁ, pivato na parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:169_0: Sace khipati yaṁ kiñci, bhaṇḍakaṁ telakumbhiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:170_0: Taṁ pādagghanakaṁ telaṁ, dhuvaṁ pivati tāvade.
tika-vin10t1:173_0: Āviñjetvāpi vā kumbhiṁ, telaṁ gāḷeti ce tathā.
tika-vin10t1:176_0: Pītaṁ telañca taṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, uddharantova dhaṁsito.
tika-vin10t1:178_0: Tattheva bhindato telaṁ, chaḍḍentassa tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t1:179_0: Jhāpentassa abhogaṁ vā, karontassa ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:190_0: Dvīsu passesu pakkhanto, heṭṭhā pādanakhā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:196_0: Hatthaṁ vāpi pasāreti, purato vāssa tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t1:198_0: Moropi gagane pakkhe, cāreti na ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:204_0: Aggahetvā gahetvā vā, hatthena pana attano;
tika-vin10t1:205_0: Ṭhānā cāveti ce moraṁ, sayaṁ ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t1:208_0: Kalāpaggena vā phuṭṭhaṁ, mukhatuṇḍena bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t1:210_0: Atikkāmeyya yo moraṁ, ṭhānā cāveti nāma so;
tika-vin10t1:213_0: Gagane pana gacchanto, kare moro nilīyati;
tika-vin10t1:216_0: Sace gaṇhāti taṁ moraṁ, itarena karena so;
tika-vin10t1:217_0: Cāvitattā pana ṭhānā, bhikkhu ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t1:219_0: Itaraṁ pana morassa, upaneti sace karaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:220_0: Na doso tattha uḍḍetvā, sayameva nilīyati.
tika-vin10t1:222_0: Disvā aṅge nilīnaṁ taṁ, theyyacittena gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:223_0: Pāde thullaccayaṁ hoti, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:231_0: Chijjamānaṁ suvaṇṇādiṁ, patte patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:237_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, hatthe vattheva matthake;
tika-vin10t1:238_0: Taṁ taṁ tassa bhave ṭhānaṁ, yattha yattha patiṭṭhitaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:244_0: Saṁharitvā sace vaṁse, ṭhapitaṁ hoti cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:245_0: Katvā punorato bhogaṁ, tathā antañca pārato.
tika-vin10t1:248_0: Na tu cīvaravaṁso so, hotīti sakalo mato.
tika-vin10t1:251_0: Itarenapi vā phuṭṭhaṁ, orimantena vā puna.
tika-vin10t1:256_0: Uddhaṁ vā ukkhipantassa, cīvaraṁ pana vaṁsato;
tika-vin10t1:259_0: Rajjukena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṁ pana cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:266_0: Saṁharitvā tu nikkhitte, cīvare viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t1:268_0: Sikkāya pakkhipitvā yaṁ, laggitaṁ hoti bhaṇḍakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:269_0: Sikkāto taṁ haranto vā, saha sikkāya vā cuto.
tika-vin10t1:272_0: Agge vā pana bunde vā, gahetvā parikaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t1:281_0: Bhittiṁ pana ca nissāya, ṭhapitepi ayaṁ nayo.
tika-vin10t1:283_0: Cālentassa ca tālassa, phalaṁ vatthu hi pūrati;
tika-vin10t1:284_0: Yenassa bandhanā mutte, tasmiṁ pārājikaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:286_0: Piṇḍiṁ chindati tālassa, sace pārājikaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:294_0: Vatthu taṁ chindato pupphaṁ, tassa pārājikaṁ vade.
tika-vin10t1:297_0: Na chijjati tato yāva, tāva naṁ parirakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:303_0: Ākārena sace tāni, ṭhānā cāveti nassati.
tika-vin10t1:306_0: Cāletvā udakaṁ puppha-ṭṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:311_0: Accuggatassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ, jalato sakalaṁ jalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:317_0: Pupphe gahetvā nāmetvā, uppāṭeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:318_0: Na tassa udakaṁ ṭhānaṁ, naṭṭho uppāṭitakkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:320_0: Yo hi sassāmike macche, theyyacittena gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t1:323_0: Tassevaṁ gaṇhato vatthu, yena macchena pūrati;
tika-vin10t1:329_0: Nīrato uppatitvā yo, tīre patati vārijo;
tika-vin10t1:333_0: Ninne macchavisaṁ nāma, pakkhipitvā gate pana.
tika-vin10t1:335_0: Pacchā macchavisaṁ macchā, khāditvā pilavanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:341_0: Gahetvā sāmikā macche, sace yanti nirālayā;
tika-vin10t1:342_0: Gaṇhato pana te sese, theyyacittena dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:345_0: Eseva ca nayo sese, kacchapādimhi vārije.
tika-vin10t1:357_0: Purato pacchato vāpi, passato vāpi kaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t1:365_0: Bandhitvā pana yā tīre, ṭhapitā niccale jale;
tika-vin10t1:366_0: Bandhanañca ṭhitokāso, ṭhānaṁ tassā dvidhā mataṁ.
tika-vin10t1:369_0: Pacchā kenacupāyena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:372_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, theyyacittassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:385_0: Theyyā titthe ṭhitaṁ nāvaṁ, āruhitvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:391_0: Āgamma balavā vāto, nāvaṁ harati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:392_0: Vāteneva haṭā nāvā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:395_0: Acāventova taṁ ṭhānā, kiṇitvā ce palāyati.
tika-vin10t1:398_0: Sayameva ca gacchantiṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:401_0: Yānaṁ nāma ratho vayhaṁ, sakaṭaṁ sandamānikā;
tika-vin10t1:408_0: Yānaṁ pājayato tassa, nisīditvā dhure pana.
tika-vin10t1:419_0: Purato pacchato vāpi, ṭhānā cāveti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:420_0: Thullaccayaṁ tu tiṇṇampi, ṭhānā cāve parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:429_0: Uddhīsu vā gahetvā taṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:431_0: Ṭhapitassa hi cakkassa, nābhiyā pana bhūmiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:434_0: Phusitvā yaṁ ṭhitaṁ bhūmiṁ, nemipassena nābhiyā;
tika-vin10t1:444_0: Ito cito ca ghaṁsanto, theyyacittena yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:447_0: Khandhaṁ oropite bhāre, tassa pārājikaṁ mataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:458_0: Parājeti paraṁ dhammaṁ, caranto ce parājito.522
tika-vin10t1:461_0: Parajjati sayaṁ dhammaṁ, caranto yopi tassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:472_0: Asitena ca lāyitvā, chinditvā vā karena ca.
tika-vin10t1:474_0: Yasmiṁ bījepi vā vatthu, sīse pūreti muṭṭhiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:475_0: Bandhanā mocite tasmiṁ, tassa pārājikaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:477_0: Acchinno pana daṇḍo vā, taco vā appamattako;
tika-vin10t1:489_0: Tañca kho sāmikānaṁ tu, dhuranikkhepane sati;
tika-vin10t1:492_0: Gahetabbā sace hoti, dvīhi khīlehi yā pana;
tika-vin10t1:496_0: Rajjuṁ vāpi pasāreti, yaṭṭhiṁ pāteti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:498_0: Yehi dvīhi payogehi, attano santakaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:499_0: Ādo thullaccayaṁ tesu, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:503_0: Gāmaṭṭhepi ca vattabbaṁ, apubbaṁ natthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:506_0: Tiṇaṁ vā pana paṇṇaṁ vā, lataṁ vā kaṭṭhameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:510_0: Tacchetvā ṭhapito rukkho, gahetabbo na kocipi.
tika-vin10t1:515_0: Lakkhaṇe challiyonaddhe, na doso koci gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:519_0: Citte cintento vā aññaṁ, bhaṇḍadeyyaṁ hotevassa.
tika-vin10t1:537_0: Āviñjitvā pavesetvā, chiddaṁ katvāpi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:539_0: Vāpiyaṁ vā taḷāke vā, bhājanaṁ attano pana;
tika-vin10t1:545_0: Anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhatvā, chindanto ubhayatthapi;
tika-vin10t1:552_0: Chinditvā yāva saṅghassa, na niyyādenti te pana;
tika-vin10t1:553_0: Ābhataṁ tāva taṁ sabbaṁ, tesameva ca santakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:555_0: Tasmā taṁ theyyacittena, gaṇhantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:558_0: Yadā niyyāditaṁ tehi, tato paṭṭhāya saṅghikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:562_0: Sabbasādhāraṇattā ca, aññaṁ viya na hotidaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:565_0: Aggiṁ vā deti satthena, ākoṭeti samantato;
tika-vin10t1:568_0: Yena vā tena vā rukkho, vinassati ca ḍayhati;
tika-vin10t1:572_0: Sīsato kaṇṇato vāpi, gīvato hatthatopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:584_0: Nivatthaṁ pana vatthaṁ yo, acchindati parassa ce;
tika-vin10t1:585_0: Paropi pana lajjāya, sahasā taṁ na muñcati.
tika-vin10t1:587_0: Ākaḍḍhati ca coropi, so paro tāva rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:596_0: Athāpi parikappetvā, pātāpeti va yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:599_0: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṁ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto;
tika-vin10t1:600_0: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vadato, na doso chaḍḍitepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:602_0: Āgantvā theyyacittena, pacchā taṁ gaṇhato siyā;
tika-vin10t1:608_0: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vutto ca, chaḍḍetvā pana bhaṇḍakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:621_0: ‘‘Raho mayā panetassa, ṭhapitaṁ kiṁ nu dassati’’;
tika-vin10t1:624_0: Tasmiṁ dāne nirussāhe, paro ce nikkhipe dhuraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:631_0: Suṅkaghātassa antova, ṭhatvā pāteti ce bahi;
tika-vin10t1:632_0: Dhuvaṁ patati ce hatthā, muttamatte parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:634_0: Taṁ rukkhe khāṇuke vāpi, hutvā paṭihataṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:635_0: Vātukkhittampi vā anto, sace patati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:637_0: Patitvā bhūmiyaṁ pacchā, vaṭṭantaṁ pana bhaṇḍakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:640_0: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā pavaṭṭantaṁ, paviṭṭhaṁ ce parājayo;
tika-vin10t1:644_0: Sārato taṁ gahetabbaṁ, yuttaṁ viya ca dissati.
tika-vin10t1:646_0: Sayaṁ vā yadi vaṭṭeti, vaṭṭāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:647_0: Aṭṭhatvā vaṭṭamānaṁ taṁ, gataṁ nāsakaraṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:649_0: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā sace anto, bahi gacchati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:652_0: Gacchante pana yāne vā, gaje vā taṁ ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:655_0: Ṭhapite ṭhitayāne vā, payogena vinā gate;
tika-vin10t1:658_0: Sace pājeti taṁ yānaṁ, ṭhapetvā yānake maṇiṁ;
tika-vin10t1:661_0: Suṅkaṭṭhāne mataṁ suṅkaṁ, gantuṁ datvāva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:665_0: Antojātaṁ dhanakkītaṁ, dinnaṁ vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t1:668_0: Bhujissaṁ vā harantassa, mānusaṁ mātarāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:683_0: Saṇikaṁ pana gacchantaṁ, sace vadati sopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:684_0: Sīghaṁ gacchati ce tassa, vacanena parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:686_0: Palāyitvā sace aññaṁ, gāmaṁ vā nigamampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:687_0: Gataṁ disvā tato tañce, palāpeti parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:700_0: So nikkhamati ce sappo, tassa pārājikaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:702_0: Tathā katvā tu maṇḍūka-mūsikānaṁ ravampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:706_0: Yena kenaci nikkhante, sappe pārājikaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:716_0: Ṭhānaṁ sālā ca vatthu ca, aṅgaṇaṁ sakalaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:719_0: Tasmā tesaṁ vasā hatthiṁ, harato kāraye budho.
tika-vin10t1:721_0: Nagarassa bahiddhā tu, ṭhitassa pana hatthino;
tika-vin10t1:724_0: Nipannassa gajassekaṁ, ṭhānaṁ taṁ uṭṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:725_0: Tasmiṁ uṭṭhitamatte tu, tassa pārājikaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:732_0: Garukaṁ theyyacittena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:748_0: Nikkhipeyyassa satthaṁ vā, vadeyya maraṇe guṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:751_0: Asandheyyova so ñeyyo, dvedhā bhinnasilā viya.
tika-vin10t1:756_0: Tattha kāyena vā kāya-paṭibaddhena vā sayaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:757_0: Mārentassa paraṁ ghāto, ayaṁ sāhatthiko mato.
tika-vin10t1:759_0: ‘‘Evaṁ tvaṁ paharitvā taṁ, mārehī’’ti ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:769_0: Ayaṁ vijjāmayo nāma, payogo pañcamo mato.
tika-vin10t1:771_0: Samatthā māraṇe yā ca, iddhi kammavipākajā;
tika-vin10t1:777_0: Bahusvapi yamuddissa, pahāraṁ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:778_0: Maraṇena ca tasseva, kammunā tena bajjhati.
tika-vin10t1:783_0: Mate pahaṭamatte vā, pacchā mubhayathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:786_0: Evaṁ sāhatthiko ñeyyo, tathā āṇattikopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:787_0: Ettāvatā samāsena, dve payogā hi dassitā.
tika-vin10t1:789_0: Vatthu kālo ca deso ca, satthañca iriyāpatho;
tika-vin10t1:792_0: Māretabbo hi yo tattha, so ‘‘vatthū’’ti pavuccati;
tika-vin10t1:793_0: Pubbaṇhādi siyā kālo, sattānaṁ yobbanādi ca.
tika-vin10t1:795_0: Deso gāmādi viññeyyo, satthaṁ taṁ sattamāraṇaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:801_0: ‘‘Yaṁ mārehī’’ti āṇatto, aññaṁ māreti ce tato;
tika-vin10t1:810_0: Āṇatto ‘‘ajja pubbaṇhe, mārehī’’ti ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:811_0: So ce māreti sāyanhe, mūlaṭṭho parimuccati.
tika-vin10t1:819_0: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇhe, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t1:824_0: ‘‘Imaṁ gāme ṭhitaṁ veriṁ, mārehī’’ti ca bhāsito;
tika-vin10t1:825_0: Sace so pana māreti, ṭhitaṁ taṁ yattha katthaci.
tika-vin10t1:827_0: Natthi tassa visaṅketo, ubho bajjhanti kammunā;
tika-vin10t1:830_0: ‘‘Vaneyevā’’ti vā vutto, gāme māreti cepi vā;
tika-vin10t1:837_0: Yena kenaci satthena, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t1:842_0: Iti vutto sace veriṁ, dhārāya itarāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:849_0: Māreti naṁ nisinnaṁ ce, visaṅketo na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:852_0: Vutto māreti gacchantaṁ, nisinnaṁ vā yathākkamaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:855_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbiriyāpathesu ca.
tika-vin10t1:857_0: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t1:860_0: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t1:861_0: Chinditvā yadi māreti, visaṅketova hoti so.
tika-vin10t1:866_0: Dīghaṁ rassaṁ kisaṁ thūlaṁ, kāḷaṁ odātameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:869_0: Sopi yaṁ kiñci āṇatto, sace māreti tādisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:873_0: Khaṇantassa ca opātaṁ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:876_0: Patitvā ca mate tasmiṁ, tassa pārājikaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:878_0: Nipatitvā panaññasmiṁ, mate doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:881_0: ‘‘Patitvā ettha yo koci, maratū’’ti hi yattakā;
tika-vin10t1:882_0: Maranti nipatitvā ce, dosā hontissa tattakā.
tika-vin10t1:887_0: Patitvā gabbhinī tasmiṁ, sagabbhā ce marissati;
tika-vin10t1:893_0: Verino tattha pātetvā, sace mārenti verino;
tika-vin10t1:894_0: Patitaṁ tattha mārenti, nīharitvā sace bahi.
tika-vin10t1:896_0: Nibbattitvā hi opāte, matā ce opapātikā;
tika-vin10t1:897_0: Asakkontā ca nikkhantuṁ, sabbattha ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:905_0: Tathā yakkhādayo pāṇe, khate uddissa bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:909_0: Pāsaṁ oḍḍeti yo tattha, sace bajjhanti pāṇino.
tika-vin10t1:914_0: Uddissa hi kate pāse, yaṁ panuddissa oḍḍito;
tika-vin10t1:917_0: Mūlena vā mudhā vāpi, dinne pāse parassa hi;
tika-vin10t1:920_0: Yena laddho sace lopi, pāsamuggaḷitampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:923_0: Yo pāsaṁ uggaḷāpetvā, yāti pāpabhayā sace;
tika-vin10t1:924_0: Taṁ disvā puna aññopi, saṇṭhapeti hi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t1:926_0: Baddhā baddhā maranti ce, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t1:929_0: Gopetvāpi na mokkho hi, pāsayaṭṭhiṁ sayaṁkataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:930_0: Tamañño puna gaṇhitvā, saṇṭhapeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:932_0: Tappaccayā marantesu, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t1:933_0: Nāsetvā sabbaso vā taṁ, jhāpetvā vā vimuccati.
tika-vin10t1:935_0: Ropentassa ca sūlaṁ vā, sajjentassa adūhalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:960_0: Jānāti ce hoti cuto hi no ce;
tika-vin10t1:978_0: Paṭhame dutiye cante, pariyāyo na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:982_0: Sesā ca tisamuṭṭhānā, tesamaṅgāni satta tu.
tika-vin10t1:996_0: Mudupiṭṭhi ca lambī ca, mukhaggāhī nisīdako;
tika-vin10t1:1027_0: Sukkaṁ yadi vimoceti, garukaṁ tassa niddise.
tika-vin10t1:1030_0: Thullaccayaṁ samuddiṭṭhaṁ, sace sukkaṁ na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:1033_0: Hoti thullaccayaṁ tassa, yadi sukkaṁ na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:1035_0: Vatthiṁ kīḷāya pūretvā, passāvetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1057_0: Ekena pana hatthena, gahetvā dutiyena vā;
tika-vin10t1:1063_0: Aṅgulīnaṁ tu pañcannaṁ, gahaṇe ekato pana;
tika-vin10t1:1064_0: Ekāyeva siyāpatti, na hi koṭṭhāsato siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1094_0: Vādāpetuñca vādetuṁ, vāditaṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1097_0: Pūjā buddhassa kātabbā, vattabbāti ca viññunā.
tika-vin10t1:1119_0: Gaṇanāya ca vācānaṁ, itthīnaṁ garukā siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1121_0: Sā ce nappaṭijānāti, tassa thullaccayaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:1141_0: Tasmiṁyeva khaṇe sā ce, jānāti garukaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1143_0: No ce jānāti sā yakkhi-petidevīsu paṇḍake;
tika-vin10t1:1144_0: Hoti thullaccayaṁ tassa, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1150_0: Obhāso tena rāgena, khaṇe tasmiṁ vijānanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1157_0: Vīmaṁsati garu hoti, paccāharati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:1172_0: Ekeneva ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1174_0: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, gilānassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:1200_0: Sace ekavipannā sā, garukaṁ ekakaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1206_0: Hatthakammampi nāmetaṁ, kiñci vatthu na hoti hi.
tika-vin10t1:1211_0: ‘‘Goṇaṁ demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1220_0: Paccayesu hi tīsveva, viññatti na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1226_0: Pharasuṁ vāpi vāsiṁ vā, nisentassāpi dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1227_0: Chindato dukkaṭaṁ rukkhaṁ, tassa pācittiyā saha.
tika-vin10t1:1232_0: Yā pana dvīhi piṇḍehi, niṭṭhānaṁ tu gamissati;
tika-vin10t1:1233_0: Hoti thullaccayaṁ tesu, paṭhame dutiye garu.
tika-vin10t1:1236_0: Tathā bhūmiṁ samaṁ katvā, bhindatopi ca taṁ kuṭiṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1241_0: Desāpetvāva bhikkhūhi, vatthuṁ pana ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:1248_0: Adesetvā sace vatthuṁ, yo kareyya mahallakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1262_0: Suddhaṁ vā yadi vāsuddhaṁ, tesu aññatarena yo.
tika-vin10t1:1276_0: Taṁ ce paro vijānāti, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:1281_0: Atha sopi ‘‘mayā diṭṭhaṁ, sutaṁ vā’’ti ca bhāsati;
tika-vin10t1:1282_0: Tesaṁ dvinnampi saṅghādi-seso hoti na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t1:1284_0: Dūtaṁ vā pana pesetvā, paṇṇaṁ vā pana sāsanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1294_0: Tathā kammaṁ karontassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1309_0: Codeti vā tathāsaññī, codāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:1313_0: Samaggassa ca saṅghassa, bhedatthaṁ vāyameyya yo;
tika-vin10t1:1316_0: So hi bhikkhūhi vattabbo, ‘‘bhedatthaṁ mā parakkama’’;
tika-vin10t1:1319_0: Vuccamāno hi teheva, nissajjeyya na ceva yaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1323_0: Disvā sutvā hi ñatvā vā, avadantassa dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1326_0: Dūrampi pana gantabbaṁ, sace sakkoti tāvade.
tika-vin10t1:1329_0: Dūtaṁ vā pana paṇṇaṁ vā, pesatopi ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1332_0: Kammavācāhi ca dvīhi, hoti thullaccayaṁ dvayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1340_0: Ñattito pana pubbe vā, pacchā vā taṅkhaṇepi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1347_0: Yasmiñca nibbematiko, taṁ sabbaṁ tassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1377_0: Kamme kariyamāne taṁ, accajaṁ garukaṁ phuse.
tika-vin10t1:1379_0: Cuṇṇaṁ paṇṇaṁ phalaṁ pupphaṁ, veḷuṁ kaṭṭhañca mattikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1391_0: Haritvā vā harāpetvā, pitūnaṁ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1394_0: Tañca kho vatthupūjatthaṁ, dātabbaṁ na panaññathā;
tika-vin10t1:1406_0: Gilānānaṁ manussānaṁ, dātabbaṁ tu sakaṁ phalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1409_0: Saṅghārāme yathā yatra, saṅghena katikā katā;
tika-vin10t1:1422_0: Tathā ropāpane vuttaṁ, ubhayattha ca bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:1424_0: Sakiṁ āṇattiyā tassa, bahūnaṁ ropane pana;
tika-vin10t1:1425_0: Sadukkaṭā tu pācitti, suddhaṁ vā dukkaṭaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1428_0: Ropane paribhogatthaṁ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:1430_0: Kappiyabhūmi ce hoti, sayaṁ ropetumeva ca;
tika-vin10t1:1434_0: Vaṭṭateva ca bhikkhūnaṁ, taṁ phalaṁ paribhuñjituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1436_0: Siñcane pana sabbattha, sayaṁ siñcāpanepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:1443_0: Siñcane dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, tathā siñcāpanepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1451_0: Ganthimaṁ gopphimaṁ nāma, vedhimaṁ veṭhimampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:1454_0: Tattha daṇḍena daṇḍaṁ vā, vaṇṭenapi ca vaṇṭakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1463_0: Veṭhimaṁ nāma veṭhetvā, kataṁ mālāguṇehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1472_0: Sabbametaṁ sayaṁ kātuṁ, kārāpetuṁ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1476_0: Aññehi pūritaṁ puppha-paṭaṁ vā vāyitumpi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1479_0: Kharapattamayaṁ mālaṁ, sabbaṁ kātuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1485_0: Pupphesuyeva vā pupphaṁ, pavesetuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1488_0: Pavesentassa pupphāni, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:1497_0: Atha kho vejjakammādi, na kattabbaṁ kudācanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1505_0: Jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭho ca, tathā bhaginiyo duve;
tika-vin10t1:1508_0: Pitucchā mātulo cāti, dasime ñātayo matā;
tika-vin10t1:1511_0: Sace bhesajjametesaṁ, nappahoti na hoti vā;
tika-vin10t1:1512_0: Yācantipi ca taṁ bhikkhuṁ, dātabbaṁ tāvakālikaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1514_0: Sace te na ca yācanti, dātabbaṁ tāvakālikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1515_0: Ābhogaṁ pana katvā vā, ‘‘dassanti puna me ime’’.
tika-vin10t1:1517_0: Etesaṁ tu kulā yāva, sattamā kuladūsanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1521_0: Sace te ñātakā honti, kātuṁ tesampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1523_0: Aññātakā sace honti, bhātuno anujāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:1526_0: Atha tesampi puttānaṁ, katvā dātabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:1538_0: Jalaṁ hatthena cāletvā, madditvā pana suttakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1540_0: Dātabbaṁ bhikkhunā katvā, tesameva ca santakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1541_0: Attano udakaṁ tesaṁ, suttaṁ vā deti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1550_0: Ṭhapetvā taṁ panaññassa, pitunopi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1553_0: Satthunā dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, karontassa pade pade.
tika-vin10t1:1559_0: Pañcannaṁ sahadhammīnaṁ, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1594_0: Kammavācā hi kātabbā, dātabbo tassa tena ca.
tika-vin10t1:1600_0: Chedaṁ vā vattabhedaṁ vā, akatvāva sadā vase.
tika-vin10t1:1602_0: Parivāso visodhetuṁ, na sakkā tattha ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:1603_0: Nikkhipitvāna taṁ vattaṁ, vatthabbaṁ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:1605_0: Tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā, puggale vāpi nikkhipe;
tika-vin10t1:1606_0: Nikkhipāmīti vattaṁ vā, parivāsanti vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:1618_0: Gumbena vatiyā vāpi, channaṭṭhāne ṭhitena tu.
tika-vin10t1:1623_0: Nikkhipitvā tato vattaṁ, gantabbaṁ tu yathāsukhaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1624_0: Antoyevāruṇe bhikkhu, gato ce yassa kassaci.
tika-vin10t1:1626_0: Ārocetvāva taṁ vattaṁ, nikkhipe puna paṇḍito;
tika-vin10t1:1636_0: Ekaccaṁ sakalaṁ vāpi, dātabbo vimatissa vā.
tika-vin10t1:1650_0: Tathā sambahulāsvekā, dve vā sambahulāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1651_0: Yā yā cirapaṭicchannā, tāsaṁ agghavasena hi.
tika-vin10t1:1657_0: Sabbātā ekato katvā, dātabbo missako mato.
tika-vin10t1:1662_0: Tattha yā apaṭicchannā, hoti āpatti yassa tu;
tika-vin10t1:1674_0: Nikkhipe santike tesaṁ, vattaṁ tesu gatesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:1686_0: Chādetvā vāpi āpattiṁ, acchādetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:1699_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti sabbattha dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1706_0: Na karoti anāpattiṁ, itthīnaṁ tu satampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1718_0: Anandhābadhiro viññū, itthī vā purisopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1721_0: Andho abadhiro vāpi, badhiro vāpi cakkhumā;
tika-vin10t1:1728_0: Cīvaraṁ chabbidhaṁ vuttaṁ, jātito pana kappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1736_0: Ekāhampi vinā bhikkhu, na vaseyya ticīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1739_0: Rajitvā kappiyaṁ binduṁ, datvā tattha ticīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1743_0: Muṭṭhittikā ca tiriyaṁ, uttamantena sā pana.
tika-vin10t1:1759_0: Tīṇipi dvepi cekaṁ vā, chinditabbaṁ pahoti ce;
tika-vin10t1:1763_0: Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, dubbhogena ca sevato.
tika-vin10t1:1780_0: Eko tantupi acchinno, adhiṭṭhānaṁ na bhindati;
tika-vin10t1:1783_0: Paṭhamaṁ aggaḷaṁ datvā, pacchā chindati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:1784_0: Ghaṭetvā koṭiyo dve vā, pacchā chindati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:1813_0: Gaṇanaṁ vā pamāṇaṁ vā, na parikkhāracoḷake;
tika-vin10t1:1826_0: Puna paccuddharitvā taṁ, vikappeyya tato paraṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1828_0: Tāva kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṁ, yāva rogo na sammati;
tika-vin10t1:1859_0: Vuttattā ca nisedhetuṁ, na sakkā vinayaññunā.
tika-vin10t1:1868_0: Dukkaṭaṁ tiriṭe vāpi, veṭhane kañcukepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1886_0: Bhikkhuno pana tenassa, vippavatthuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1890_0: Aruṇe uṭṭhite kiṁ nu, kātabbaṁ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:1893_0: Tabbhayā pana so bhikkhu, naggo gacchati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1896_0: Na tassākappiyaṁ nāma, cīvaraṁ atthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:1898_0: Nigāsetvā gahetvā ca, gantvā bhikkhussa santikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:1902_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pārupanādisu.
tika-vin10t1:1907_0: There ca dahare maggaṁ, gacchantesu ubhosupi;
tika-vin10t1:1911_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṁ vatthaṁ, na passambhati nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1914_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṁ vatthaṁ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1917_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṁ vatthaṁ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1927_0: Paccāsāya tato uddhaṁ, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1935_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā bhuttaṁ, vatthaṁ aññātikāya yo;
tika-vin10t1:1939_0: Tathā sesehi ca dvīhi, dīpitaṁ dukkaṭadvayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1941_0: Sikkhamānāya vā hatthe, dhovanatthāya deti ce;
tika-vin10t1:1942_0: Sā hutvā upasampannā, pacchā dhovati so nayo.
tika-vin10t1:1951_0: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṁ, sace dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1953_0: ‘‘Dhovā’’ti bhikkhunī vuttā, sace sabbaṁ karoti sā;
tika-vin10t1:1963_0: Tāya dhovāpane vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:1965_0: Avuttā paribhuttaṁ vā, aññaṁ vā yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t1:1984_0: Aññaṁ pana parikkhāraṁ, na doso hoti gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:1995_0: Aññassatthāya vā tassa, ñātake vā pavārite.
tika-vin10t1:2004_0: Yassa tīṇipi naṭṭhāni, dve vā ekampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2005_0: Dve vā ekampi vā tena, sāditabbaṁ na kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:2015_0: Cīvare pana yo tassa, lābhā nissaggiyaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:2029_0: Akappiyaṁ suvaṇṇādiṁ, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2031_0: Rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ vā, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:2032_0: Atthāya gaṇhituṁ kiñci, dīyamānaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2037_0: Netvā akappiyaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, itthaṁ koci sace vade;
tika-vin10t1:2040_0: Ārāmaṁ vā vihāraṁ vā, cetiyaṁ vā karohi’’ti;
tika-vin10t1:2041_0: Na ca vaṭṭati taṁ vatthuṁ, sabbesaṁ sampaṭicchituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2043_0: Anāmasitvā saṅghaṁ vā, gaṇaṁ vā puggalampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:2046_0: Taṁ hiraññaṁ suvaṇṇaṁ vā, nisedhetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2053_0: Gahaṇaṁ paribhogo vā, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:2056_0: Iccevaṁ pana vatvā ce, deti sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2058_0: Kārāpeti ca kedāre, chindāpetvā vanaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:2062_0: Bhāgaṁ dethā’’ti vatvā ce, uṭṭhāpeti kahāpaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:2071_0: Rajjuyā vāpi daṇḍena, khettaṁ mināti yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:2073_0: Khale vā rakkhati ṭhatvā, khalatopi tato puna;
tika-vin10t1:2080_0: Āharanti ca yaṁ vuttā, sabbesaṁ tamakappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2085_0: ‘‘Gāvo demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2089_0: Kappiyena ca vākyena, sabbaṁ vaṭṭati gaṇhituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2091_0: Hatthiṁ vā mahisaṁ assaṁ, goṇaṁ kukkuṭasūkaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2092_0: Dentesu ca manussesu, na ca vaṭṭati gaṇhituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2094_0: Paṭisiddhepi saṅghassa, datvā gacchati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:2095_0: Mūlaṁ datvā ca saṅghassa, keci gaṇhanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2101_0: Yadi codetiyeva cha, codanā diguṇā ṭhiti.
tika-vin10t1:2112_0: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, sevamānassa dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2122_0: Anāpatti tulaṁ vāpi, bahuṁ vā sabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2129_0: Imesaṁ pana tiṇṇampi, tatiyaṁ tu kriyākriyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2132_0: Channaṁ orena vassānaṁ, karontassa ca santhataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2136_0: Kataṁ vā pana aññena, labhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:2152_0: Gacchante pana yāne vā, hatthiassādikesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:2158_0: Yāne pana agacchante, asse vā hatthipiṭṭhiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2167_0: Suttakena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṁ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2171_0: Yo caññavihito vāpi, āpatti yadi gacchati.
tika-vin10t1:2176_0: Nivāsatthāya vā gantvā, harantassa tato paraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2177_0: Acchinnaṁ vāpi nissaṭṭhaṁ, labhitvā haratopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2196_0: Muttā maṇi silā saṅkho, pavāḷaṁ lohitaṅkako;
tika-vin10t1:2203_0: Suttaṁ vatthaṁ halaṁ phālaṁ, kappiyaṁ evamādikaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2206_0: Sampaṭicchati yo bhikkhu, tassa nissaggiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2209_0: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthumpi, sabbatthāya ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2217_0: ‘‘Idaṁ ayyassa hotū’’ti, vutte vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t1:2220_0: Paṭikkhittepi taṁ vatthuṁ, ṭhapetvā yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:2221_0: Tathā gopāyitabbaṁ taṁ, yathā taṁ na vinassati.
tika-vin10t1:2224_0: Iccevaṁ bhikkhuno vattuṁ, na vaṭṭati akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2230_0: Gahetuṁ aññato laddhaṁ, bhuñjituṁ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2232_0: Yaṁ kiñci pana sambhūtaṁ, paccayaṁ vatthuto tato;
tika-vin10t1:2245_0: Vatthuṁ nissaggiyassāpi, vatthuṁ vā dukkaṭassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:2246_0: Kappiyassa ca vatthuṁ vā, yo nissaggiyavatthunā.
tika-vin10t1:2251_0: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthuṁ vā, vatthuṁ vā kappiyassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:2255_0: Parivatteti yo tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2261_0: Tena dve dukkaṭā honti, cetāpentassa rūpiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2276_0: Tasmā mātāpitūnampi, vatthuṁ yaṁ kiñci kappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2279_0: Sakaṁ vā deti ce bhaṇḍaṁ, evaṁ vatvāna mātuyā;
tika-vin10t1:2280_0: Mātuyā vā tathā bhaṇḍaṁ, sayaṁ gaṇhāti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2285_0: ‘‘Gahetvā vā idaṁ nāma, bhuñjitvā odanaṁ imaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2286_0: Idaṁ nāma karohī’’ti, vattuṁ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2289_0: Challiṁ vā pana valliṁ vā, kaṭṭhaṁ vā dārumeva vā.
tika-vin10t1:2302_0: Nissaggiye ca vatthumhi, naṭṭhe bhuttepi vā yathā;
tika-vin10t1:2308_0: ‘‘Idaṁ mamatthi attho me, iminā’’ti ca bhāsato;
tika-vin10t1:2314_0: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā tu, ukkaṭṭho majjhimomako.
tika-vin10t1:2319_0: Ukkaṭṭho nāma so patto, yo taṁ sabbaṁ tu gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t1:2320_0: Majjhimo tassupaḍḍho ca, tadupaḍḍho ca omako.
tika-vin10t1:2323_0: Evaṁ majjhimaomesu, nava pattā bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t1:2326_0: Tasmā nāpi adhiṭṭhānaṁ, na gacchanti vikappanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2334_0: Yaṁ pattaṁ na vikappeti, yaṁ nādhiṭṭheti vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2349_0: Yo hi nissaggiyaṁ pattaṁ, anissajjeva bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t1:2364_0: Yaṁ kiñci sodakaṁ pattaṁ, paṭisāmeyya dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2367_0: Bhikkhuno sodakaṁ pattaṁ, otāpetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2370_0: Miḍḍhante paribhaṇḍante, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2371_0: Miḍḍhiyā paribhaṇḍe vā, vitthiṇṇe pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2382_0: Daṇḍe vā nāgadante vā, laggetumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2389_0: Bhattapūropi vā chatte, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2392_0: Kavāṭaṁ na paṇāmeyya, pattahattho sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:2398_0: Pattaṁ paṭiggahaṁ katvā, dhovituṁ hatthameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2399_0: Mukhato nīhaṭaṁ patte, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2401_0: Anāpatti dasāhassa, antoyeva ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2408_0: Pañcabandhanaūnasmiṁ, patte sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2409_0: Viññāpeyya navaṁ pattaṁ, tassa nissaggiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2414_0: Pañca vā rājiyo yassa, ekā vāpi dasaṅgulā;
tika-vin10t1:2415_0: Apatto nāmayaṁ patto, viññāpeyya tato paraṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2418_0: Baddho vaṭṭati maṭṭho ce, ayocuṇṇena vāṇiyā.
tika-vin10t1:2420_0: Pattaṁ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṁ, tassa nissaggiyaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:2423_0: Dīyamāne tu pattasmiṁ, yassa so na ca ruccati;
tika-vin10t1:2424_0: Appicchatāya vā pattaṁ, taṁ na gaṇhāti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2431_0: Sace so taṁ jigucchanto, appadese ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t1:2434_0: Naṭṭhe bhinnepi vā patte, anāpatti pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t1:2435_0: Attano ñātakādīnaṁ, gaṇhato vā dhanena vā.
tika-vin10t1:2444_0: Tato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṁ, taṁ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2451_0: Sarīrabhoge netabbaṁ, sāyituṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2456_0: Sayaṁ tāpeti ce bhikkhu, sattāhampi nirāmisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2457_0: Tāpanaṁ navanītassa, sāmapāko na hoti so.
tika-vin10t1:2459_0: Pacchābhattaṁ gahetvā ce, yena kenaci tāpitaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2460_0: Vaṭṭateva ca taṁ sappi, sattāhampi nirāmisaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2467_0: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṁ, taṁ na vaṭṭati sāyituṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2477_0: Khīraṁ dadhi ca sappi ca, navanītañca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2479_0: ‘‘Yesaṁ kappati maṁsañhi, tesaṁ sappī’’ti kiṁ idaṁ?
tika-vin10t1:2489_0: Telaṁ vā navanītaṁ vā, sappiṁ vā ākiranti hi.
tika-vin10t1:2491_0: Bhattasitthāni vā tattha, taṇḍulā vā bhavanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:2506_0: Attanā yaṁ kataṁ telaṁ, taṁ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2522_0: Vasānaṁ pana pañcannaṁ, telaṁ pañcavidhaṁ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:2530_0: Sace anupasampanno, katvā taṁ deti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2533_0: Paṭiggahetuṁ kātuṁ vā, pacchābhattaṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2545_0: Phāṇitaṁ tu purebhattaṁ, gahitaṁ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2552_0: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṁ, taṁ na vaṭṭati sāyituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2555_0: Hoti tassa anāpatti, pacchābhattaṁ katepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2558_0: Tadahe deti ce katvā, sāmisampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2567_0: Pakkhipitvā kataṁ khīraṁ, hoti taṁ yāvakālikaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2575_0: Labhitvā pana nissaṭṭhaṁ, taṁ tu sattāhakālikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2576_0: Aruādīni makkhetuṁ, sāyituṁ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2578_0: Aññassa pana bhikkhussa, kāyabhoge ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2595_0: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṁ, katvā nipphādane tathā.
tika-vin10t1:2603_0: Ovassāpeti ce kāyaṁ, naggo satipi cīvare;
tika-vin10t1:2616_0: Sāmaṁ tu cīvaraṁ datvā, acchindantassa taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:2628_0: Āṇāpeti sace aññaṁ, bhikkhuṁ gaṇhāti cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2632_0: Ekāyassa ca vācāya, honti āpattiyo bahū.
tika-vin10t1:2646_0: So vā deti sace tuṭṭho, duṭṭho vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2663_0: Vīte nissaggiyaṁ vuttaṁ, phalake phalakepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2674_0: Sace akappiyaṁ suttaṁ, vāreneva vinanti te;
tika-vin10t1:2680_0: Dvepi vemaṁ gahetvā vā, ekato vā vinanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:2694_0: Vikappaṁ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2710_0: Vassacchedo na kātabbo, saṅghikaṁ taṁ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t1:2718_0: Atthate kathine tassa, pañca māsā pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t1:2726_0: Ṭhapetvā cīvaraṁ gāme, paccaye sati tādise.
tika-vin10t1:2729_0: Uttariṁ vasato doso, vinā saṅghassa sammutiṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2737_0: Yaṁ gāmaṁ gocaraṁ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin10t1:2738_0: Tasmiṁ gāme ṭhapetuṁ taṁ, māsamekaṁ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2746_0: Gāmasīmampi vā gantvā, vasitvā yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:2747_0: Cīvarassa pavattiṁ so, ñatvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2750_0: Khippaṁ paccuddhare ṭhāne, atireke hi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t1:2759_0: Jānaṁ pariṇataṁ lābhaṁ, bhikkhusaṅghassa yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2765_0: Cīvaraṁ vā parasseka-mekaṁ vā pana attano;
tika-vin10t1:2766_0: Pariṇāmeyya ce saddhiṁ, dve pācittiyo siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2768_0: Saṅghassa pana yaṁ dinnaṁ, taṁ gahetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2771_0: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, puggalassapi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2797_0: Bhūtena vā abhūtena, yena kenaci vatthunā.
tika-vin10t1:2799_0: Yāya kāyaci bhāsāya, hatthamuddāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2827_0: Na ceva piyakāmassa, na ca bhedatthinopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:2835_0: Dhammaṁ saha bhaṇantassa, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2840_0: Dukkaṭaṁ hoti bhikkhusmiṁ, tathā bhikkhuniyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:2843_0: Ekato uddisāpeti, sajjhāyaṁ vā karoti yo;
tika-vin10t1:2844_0: Bhaṇantaṁ paguṇaṁ ganthaṁ, opāteti ca yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:2847_0: Uddesaṁ tu anāpatti, bhaṇane tena ekato.
tika-vin10t1:2856_0: Tissannaṁ pana rattīnaṁ, uddhaṁ yo pana rattiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2857_0: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṁ aññena, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2859_0: Vatthuṁ yaṁ pana niddiṭṭhaṁ, methunassa pahonakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2863_0: Itarasmiṁ nipanne vā, sace bhikkhu nipajjati.
tika-vin10t1:2868_0: Sace pidhāya vā gabbhaṁ, nipajjatipidhāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:2883_0: Anāpatti dirattaṁ vā, tirattaṁ vasato saha;
tika-vin10t1:2897_0: Rattiyaṁ yo nipajjeyya, deviyā paṇḍakena vā.
tika-vin10t1:2907_0: Vinā dhammaṁ bhaṇantassa, hoti pācitti itthiyā.
tika-vin10t1:2912_0: Channaṁ upari vācānaṁ, padādīnaṁ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2918_0: Ṭhitassa mātugāmassa, dhammaṁ yo pana bhāsati;
tika-vin10t1:2919_0: Channaṁ upari vācānaṁ, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2922_0: Uttari chahi vācāhi, vadato hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:2927_0: Purise sati viññusmiṁ, sayaṁ uṭṭhāya vā puna;
tika-vin10t1:2930_0: Aññissā puna aññissā, itthiyā bhaṇatopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:2938_0: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniṁ bhikkhuṁ, bhūte pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2940_0: No ce jānāti so vuttaṁ, ārocentassa bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:2949_0: Kāyato vācato kāya-vācato ca tidhā siyā;
tika-vin10t1:2960_0: Tasmā suddhassa duṭṭhullaṁ, vadaṁ pācittiyaṁ phuse.
tika-vin10t1:2968_0: Vatthuṁ vā pana āpattiṁ, ārocentassa kevalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2975_0: Khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya, pathaviṁ yo akappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2976_0: Bhedāpeyya ca bhindeyya, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2985_0: Iccevaṁ tu vadantassa, koci doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:2987_0: ‘‘Imaṁ khaṇa ca okāsaṁ, idha pokkharaṇiṁ khaṇa;
tika-vin10t1:2988_0: Imasmiṁ khaṇa okāse’’, vattumevaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2990_0: ‘‘Kandaṁ khaṇa kurundaṁ vā, thūṇaṁ khaṇa ca khāṇukaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2991_0: Mūlaṁ khaṇa ca tālaṁ vā’’, evaṁ vadati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2993_0: ‘‘Imaṁ mūlaṁ imaṁ valliṁ, imaṁ tālaṁ imaṁ naḷaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:2994_0: Khaṇā’’ti niyametvāna, vattuṁ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2997_0: Bhikkhunā apanetabbo, bahalaṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3002_0: Sace patati toyasmiṁ, deve vuṭṭhepi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3005_0: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṁ soṇḍiṁ, khaṇanti yadi tattha tu;
tika-vin10t1:3006_0: Rajaṁ patati ce pubbaṁ, pacchā devobhivassati.
tika-vin10t1:3011_0: Vārinā paṭhamaṁ puṇṇe, pacchā patati ce rajaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3012_0: Taṁ vaṭṭati vikopetuṁ, toye devo hi vassati.
tika-vin10t1:3020_0: Abbhokāse sace vaṭṭho, cātumāsaṁ tu vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3039_0: Anovaṭṭho ca bhikkhūnaṁ, sabbadā hoti kappiyo.
tika-vin10t1:3041_0: Vuṭṭhe puna ca gehasmiṁ, gehaṁ chādenti taṁ sace;
tika-vin10t1:3044_0: Yattakaṁ tattha tintaṁ tu, tattakaṁ hotyakappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3045_0: Atintaṁ tattha yaṁ yaṁ tu, taṁ taṁ hoti hi kappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3047_0: Temito vārinā so ce, ekābaddhova bhūmiyā;
tika-vin10t1:3048_0: Pathavī ceva sā jātā, na vaṭṭati tato paraṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3053_0: Tattha laggaṁ rajaṁ saṇhaṁ, aghaṁsantova mattaso;
tika-vin10t1:3057_0: Ṭhāne tiṭṭhati so tasmā, vikopeyya yathāsukhaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3059_0: Abbhokāse ṭhitaṁ thambhaṁ, cāletvā panito cito;
tika-vin10t1:3060_0: Pathaviṁ tu vikopetvā, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3062_0: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṁ vā, khāṇukaṁ vāpi gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:3063_0: Ayameva nayo doso, ujumuddharato na ca.
tika-vin10t1:3065_0: Pāsāṇaṁ yadi vā rukkhaṁ, uccāletvā pavaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3066_0: Na doso suddhacittassa, sace pathavi bhijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3071_0: Kaṇṭakaṁ sūcimaṭṭhiṁ vā, khilaṁ vā bhūmiyaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:3072_0: Ākoṭetuṁ pavesetuṁ, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3075_0: Bhikkhussa pana passāva-mevaṁ kātuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3078_0: Samajjato samaṁ kātuṁ, ghaṁsituṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3080_0: Pādaṅguṭṭhena vā bhūmiṁ, likhitumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3081_0: Bhindantena ca pādehi, tathā caṅkamitumpi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3084_0: Aghaṁsanto gahetvā ce, hatthaṁ dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3086_0: Sayaṁ dahati ce bhūmiṁ, dahāpeti parehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3089_0: Ṭhānesu yattakesvaggiṁ, deti dāpeti vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3092_0: Ṭhapetuṁ bhikkhuno aggiṁ, bhūmiyaṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3095_0: Aggiṁ upari dārūnaṁ, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3096_0: Dahanto tāni gantvā so, bhūmiṁ dahati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:3102_0: Khāṇuke sukkharukkhe vā, aggiṁ dātuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3104_0: Anāpatti tiṇukkaṁ tu, gahetvā pana gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:3105_0: Ḍayhamāne tu hatthasmiṁ, sace pāteti bhūmiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3107_0: Puna taṁ patitaṭṭhāne, datvā tassa panindhanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3121_0: Udakaṭṭho thalaṭṭhoti, duvidho hoti so pana;
tika-vin10t1:3125_0: Vikopentassa taṁ sabbaṁ, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3127_0: Viyūhitvā tu hatthena, nhāyituṁ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3128_0: Hoti tassa ca sabbampi, ṭhānañhi sakalaṁ jalaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3130_0: Udakena vinā cecca, taṁ panuddharituṁ jalā;
tika-vin10t1:3131_0: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhussa, ṭhānasaṅkamanañhi taṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3137_0: Vikopentassa vā tattha, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3140_0: Gacchanti hi yato tāni, bījagāmena saṅgahaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3146_0: Tasmā tassa kato hoti, bījagāmena saṅgaho.
tika-vin10t1:3149_0: Aphalitāya yo khāṇu, bhūtagāmena so mato.
tika-vin10t1:3151_0: Phalitā kadalī yāva, nīlapaṇṇā ca tāva sā;
tika-vin10t1:3154_0: Aggato pana paṭṭhāya, yadāyaṁ veḷu sussati;
tika-vin10t1:3163_0: Mūlamattepi vā yesaṁ, paṇṇamattepi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3167_0: Pattavaṭṭi yadā nīlā, niggacchati tadā na ca.
tika-vin10t1:3180_0: Vandākā vāpi aññaṁ vā, rukkhe jāyati yaṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:3182_0: Rukkhovassa siyā ṭhānaṁ, vikopetuṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3186_0: Yāva dve tīṇi pattāni, na sañjāyanti tāva so.
tika-vin10t1:3188_0: Pattesu pana jātesu, vatthu pācittiyassa so;
tika-vin10t1:3189_0: Ghaṁsitvā pana taṁ tasmā, apanetuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3198_0: Sace taṁ makuḷaṁ hoti, hoti dukkaṭavatthukaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3200_0: Rukkhe tacaṁ vikopetvā, tathā pappaṭikampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:3201_0: Niyyāsampi panallasmiṁ, gahetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3206_0: Pupphaṁ paṇḍupalāsaṁ vā, phalaṁ vā pakkameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:3209_0: Nāmetvā phaliniṁ sākhaṁ, dātuṁ vaṭṭati gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:3210_0: Sayaṁ khāditukāmo ce, dātumevaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3215_0: Yesaṁ ruhati rukkhānaṁ, sākhā tesampi sākhinaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3221_0: ‘‘Rukkhaṁ chinda lataṁ chinda, kandaṁ mūlampi uddhara;
tika-vin10t1:3224_0: ‘‘Ambaṁ jambumpi nimbaṁ vā, chinda bhinduddharā’’ti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3227_0: ‘‘Imaṁ rukkhaṁ imaṁ valliṁ, imaṁ challiṁ imaṁ lataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3228_0: Chinda bhindā’’ti vā vattuṁ, niyametvā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3231_0: Sabbameva kataṁ hoti, ekasmiṁ kappiye kate.
tika-vin10t1:3233_0: Ekato pana baddhāni, ucchudārūni honti ce;
tika-vin10t1:3234_0: Kappiyaṁ karonto pana, dāruṁ vijjhati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3236_0: Valliyā rajjuyā vāpi, yāya baddhāni tāni hi;
tika-vin10t1:3237_0: Bhājanena samānattā, taṁ vijjhati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3245_0: Kaṭāhaṁ yadi muñcitvā, anto carati miñjakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3246_0: Bhindāpetvā kapitthaṁ taṁ, kāretabbaṁ tu kappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3262_0: Kamme aropite cevaṁ, vadantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3281_0: Vadato dukkaṭaṁ hoti, yassa kassaci santike.
tika-vin10t1:3287_0: Ajjhokāse tu mañcādiṁ, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:3290_0: Nevuddhareyya saṅghassa, uddharāpeyya vā na taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3291_0: Pakkamanto sace tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3293_0: Vassike caturo māse, sace devo na vassati;
tika-vin10t1:3294_0: Ajjhokāse tathā cāpi, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3296_0: Yattha vassati hemante, cattāro aparepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:3297_0: Ṭhapetuṁ tattha mañcādiṁ, aṭṭha māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3300_0: Mañcādiṁ pana saṅghassa, ṭhapetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3302_0: Aññassatthāya yaṁ kiñci, santhataṁ yadi saṅghikaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3303_0: Yattha katthaci vā ṭhāne, yena kenaci bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:3305_0: Yāva so na nisīdeyya, ‘‘gacchā’’ti na vadeyya vā;
tika-vin10t1:3311_0: Santhataṁ bhikkhunā taṁ ce, bhāro tasseva tāva taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3312_0: Yāva āṇāpako tattha, āgantvā na nisīdati.
tika-vin10t1:3323_0: Nikkhamitvā sace tasmā, ṭhānā aññattha gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:3333_0: Abbhokāse ṭhapetvā taṁ, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3335_0: Sace āraññakenāpi, anovasse ca no sati;
tika-vin10t1:3336_0: Laggetvā pana rukkhasmiṁ, gantabbaṁ tu yathāsukhaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3338_0: Yathā upacikādīhi, na khajjati na lujjati;
tika-vin10t1:3339_0: Tathā katvāpi taṁ sabbaṁ, gantuṁ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3354_0: Etaṁ dasavidhaṁ seyyaṁ, santharitvāpi vā sayaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3358_0: Paṭhame dukkaṭaṁ pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3372_0: Sāpekkhova ca gantvā taṁ, tattha ṭhatvāpi pucchati;
tika-vin10t1:3376_0: Yo pubbupagataṁ bhikkhuṁ, jānaṁ anupakhajja ca;
tika-vin10t1:3380_0: Yāva taṁ mañcapīṭhaṁ vā, nikkhamantassa vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3388_0: Nisīdantassa vā tattha, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3398_0: Sabbattha dukkaṭaṁ vuttaṁ, nivāso ca nivārito.
tika-vin10t1:3407_0: Vihārā saṅghikā bhikkhuṁ, nikkaḍḍheyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3408_0: Nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā kuddho, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3411_0: Nikkaḍḍheti sace tassa, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:3413_0: Ṭhapetvā ca ṭhapetvā ca, nikkaḍḍhantassa antarā;
tika-vin10t1:3419_0: Sace so sakimāṇatto, dvārepi bahuke pana;
tika-vin10t1:3423_0: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, tathā nikkaḍḍhanepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:3442_0: Āhaccapādake mañce, pīṭhe vā pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3444_0: Nisīdantassa vā tasmiṁ, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3448_0: Heṭṭhā aparibhoge vā, sīsaghaṭṭāya vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3453_0: Yattha paṭāṇi vā dinnā, tattha ṭhatvā lageti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3463_0: Adhiṭṭheyyaṁ tato uddhaṁ, adhiṭṭheti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3464_0: Tassa pācittiyaṁ hoti, dukkaṭaṁ tattha tiṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t1:3467_0: Yasmiṁ ṭhāne ṭhitaṁ bhikkhuṁ, olokento na passati.
tika-vin10t1:3469_0: Tasmiṁ ṭhāne pana ṭhātuṁ, neva bhikkhussa vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3475_0: Na doso dvattipariyāye, leṇe tiṇakuṭīsu vā;
tika-vin10t1:3479_0: Jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ toyaṁ, tiṇaṁ vā mattikampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3480_0: Yadi siñceyya pācitti, siñcāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3482_0: Acchinditvā sace dhāraṁ, mattikaṁ siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t1:3488_0: Ekāva ce siyāpatti, divasampi ca sandatu;
tika-vin10t1:3495_0: Khayaṁ vā āvilattaṁ vā, jalaṁ gacchati tādise.
tika-vin10t1:3523_0: Osārentova te dhamme, ovadeyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3539_0: Ṭhapetvā dukkaṭaṁ bālaṁ, gilānaṁ gamikaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3541_0: Adhamme pana kammasmiṁ, adhammanti ca saññino;
tika-vin10t1:3545_0: Nava pācittiyo vuttā, samaggepi ca tattakā.
tika-vin10t1:3547_0: Navakānaṁ vasā dvinnaṁ, aṭṭhārasa bhavanti tā;
tika-vin10t1:3550_0: ‘‘Osārehī’’ti vutto vā, pañhaṁ puṭṭho katheti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3566_0: Catūsvapi nikāyesu, eko vā potthakopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:3598_0: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, sace vadati tīṇipi.
tika-vin10t1:3617_0: Vadato sammate bhikkhu, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3629_0: Sace bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu, dadeyya pana cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3635_0: Tattha bhikkhuniyā dinnaṁ, cīvaraṁ idha bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:3639_0: Cīvaraṁ yo hi sibbeyya, sibbāpeyya parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:3642_0: Yaṁ vā nivāsituṁ sakkā, yaṁ vā pārupanūpagaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3645_0: Sayaṁ sūciṁ pavesetvā, sibbantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:3649_0: Ekaṁ pācittiyaṁ vuttaṁ, payogassa vasā bahū.
tika-vin10t1:3652_0: Niṭṭhāpeti sace sabbaṁ, ekaṁ pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3654_0: ‘‘Yamettha cīvare kammaṁ, bhāro sabbaṁ tavā’’ti hi;
tika-vin10t1:3655_0: Āṇatto bhikkhunā sabbaṁ, niṭṭhāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:3661_0: Kā hi nāma kathā atthi? Tikapācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3674_0: Paṭipajjeyya maggaṁ ce, aññatra samayā idha.
tika-vin10t1:3677_0: Agāmake araññe vā, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3719_0: Tathā saṁvidahitvā vā, tiriyaṁ taraṇāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:3726_0: Bhojanaṁ pañcadhā vuttaṁ, gahaṇe tassa dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3738_0: Aññaṁ vā pana yaṁ kiñci, ṭhapetvā pañcabhojanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3754_0: Bhuñjitabbaṁ sakiṁ tattha, tato uddhaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3756_0: Dutiye divase tattha, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṁ mataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3762_0: Nānāṭṭhānesu paññatto, yo ca, nānākulehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3763_0: Bhuñjato pana sabbattha, na doso paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin10t1:3766_0: Ādito pana paṭṭhāya, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3769_0: Odissapi ca paññatte, paritte bhuñjato sakiṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3776_0: Gaṇoti pana niddiṭṭhā, cattāro vā tatuttariṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3778_0: Yaṁ nimantanato vāpi, laddhaṁ viññattitopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3779_0: Bhojanaṁ pana pañcannaṁ, hoti aññataraṁ idha.
tika-vin10t1:3782_0: Nimanteti sace bhikkhū, cattāro bahukepi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3787_0: Tato tassa ca te bhikkhū, sādiyitvā nimantanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3788_0: Ekato nānato vā ce, gantvā gaṇhanti ekato.
tika-vin10t1:3793_0: Ekato nānato vāpi, gamanaṁ bhojanampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3794_0: Kāraṇanti na taṁ viññū, bhaṇanti gaṇabhojane.
tika-vin10t1:3799_0: Nānato vekato gantvā, sace gaṇhanti ekato;
tika-vin10t1:3806_0: Gahetvā ekato dvinnaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ vā bhuñjataṁ tathā.
tika-vin10t1:3815_0: Nattheva ca visaṅketaṁ, yāguādīsu taṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3835_0: Bhojanānaṁ tu pañcannaṁ, yena kena nimantito;
tika-vin10t1:3836_0: Taṁ ṭhapetvā sace aññaṁ, bhojanaṁ paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t1:3841_0: Yattha khīraṁ rasaṁ vāpi, ākiranti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3851_0: Nimantitassa vā nicca-bhatte doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3858_0: Pātheyyatthāya manthā vā, ye hi tattha ca bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:3861_0: Tato ce uttariṁ tassa, hoti pācitti gaṇhato.
tika-vin10t1:3864_0: Gahitā pana pūvā’’ti, bhikkhuṁ disvā vade budho.
tika-vin10t1:3867_0: Gaṇhatopi ca taṁ sutvā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3872_0: Yena tattha tayo laddhā, pattapūrā tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:3873_0: Dve saṅghassa padātabbā, dve ce eko, na ekato.
tika-vin10t1:3888_0: Odano sattu kummāso, maccho maṁsanti sabbaso;
tika-vin10t1:3891_0: Odano tattha sattannaṁ, dhaññānaṁ odano mato;
tika-vin10t1:3897_0: Sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu, varako godhumo tathā;
tika-vin10t1:3903_0: Sattannaṁ pana dhaññānaṁ, odano yāgu vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3906_0: Hatthena gahitokāse, odhiṁ dasseti yā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3909_0: Abbhuṇhā pana yā yāgu, uddhanoropitā tanu;
tika-vin10t1:3910_0: Sace odhiṁ na dasseti, na janeti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3912_0: Puna sā sītalībhūtā, ghanabhāvaṁ gatā sace;
tika-vin10t1:3913_0: Odhiṁ dasseti so pubbe, tanubhāvo na rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:3919_0: Odhiṁ pana ca dasseti, sañjaneti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3922_0: ‘‘Yāguṁ gaṇhatha, yāgu’’nti, vatvā denti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:3925_0: Taṁ pacitvā sace denti, yāgusaṅgahitā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3936_0: Puthukā vā tato tāhi, katabhattampi sattupi;
tika-vin10t1:3937_0: Suddhā na pana pūvā vā, pavārenti kadācipi.
tika-vin10t1:3940_0: Koṭṭetvā denti taṁ cuṇṇaṁ, sattusaṅgahitaṁ mataṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3942_0: Bhajjitānaṁ tu vīhīnaṁ, na pavārenti taṇḍulā;
tika-vin10t1:3943_0: Tesaṁ pana ca yaṁ cuṇṇaṁ, taṁ janeti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3949_0: Kuṇḍakaṁ pana vīhīnaṁ, na janeti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3951_0: Lājā vā pana teheva, katabhattampi sattu vā;
tika-vin10t1:3952_0: Khajjakaṁ pana suddhaṁ vā, na janeti pavāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3955_0: Yaṁ kiñci bhajjitaṁ piṭṭhaṁ, na pavāreti suddhakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3961_0: Na so tena pavāreti, avatthuttāti dīpitaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3966_0: Maṁsaṁ pana ca khādanto, kappiyaṁ vā akappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:3970_0: Nisedhaṁ na pavāreti, tathā aññaṁ akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3973_0: Patte hatthe mukhe vāpi, bhojanaṁ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3976_0: Pavāreti sace natthi, na pavāreti katthaci.
tika-vin10t1:3978_0: Gilitvā ca mukhe bhattaṁ, sesamādāya gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:3979_0: Antarā ca nisedhento, na pavāreti bhojanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3986_0: Asanassa upacchedā, na pavāreti soti hi;
tika-vin10t1:3989_0: Gaṇhato pacchimaṁ aṅgaṁ, dadato purimaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:3990_0: Ubhinnaṁ aḍḍhateyyaṁ ce, vinā hatthaṁ pasāritaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:3995_0: Hatthe ādhārake vāpi, pattaṁ ūrūsu vā ṭhitaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4005_0: Pidahanto sakaṁ pattaṁ, hatthehi na pavārito.
tika-vin10t1:4008_0: Kāyena vāpi vācāya, hoti kassa pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4013_0: Sace vadati tassāpi, na panatthi pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4016_0: Samaṁsañhi rasaṁ netvā, gaṇhathāti rasaṁ vade;
tika-vin10t1:4017_0: Taṁ sutvā ca nisedhento, neva hoti pavārito.
tika-vin10t1:4022_0: Sace maṁsaṁ visuṁ katvā, ‘‘gaṇha maṁsarasa’’nti vā;
tika-vin10t1:4023_0: Vadeyyatthi ca maṁsaṁ ce, paṭikkhepe pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4031_0: Vadanti ce paṭikkhepe, neva hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4037_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, ñeyyo maṁsakarambake;
tika-vin10t1:4046_0: ‘‘Yāgumissakaṁ gaṇhā’’ti, vutte tattha ca yāgu ce;
tika-vin10t1:4047_0: Samā bahutarā vā sā, na pavāreti so kira.
tika-vin10t1:4049_0: Mandā yāgu, bahuṁ bhattaṁ, sace hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4050_0: Idaṁ sabbattha niddiṭṭhaṁ, kāraṇaṁ pana duddasaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4052_0: Rasaṁ bahurase bhatte, khīraṁ vā bahukhīrake;
tika-vin10t1:4053_0: Gaṇhathāti visuṁ katvā, deti natthi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4058_0: Udakaṁ vāpi patvā so, sace tiṭṭhati kaddamaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4059_0: Atirittaṁ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṁ tato puna.
tika-vin10t1:4061_0: Pīṭhake yo nisīditvā, pavāreti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:4064_0: Sace mañce nisīditvā, pavāreti tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:4065_0: Ito saṁsarituṁ etto, īsakampi na labbhati.
tika-vin10t1:4067_0: Tena mañcena naṁ saddhiṁ, vaṭṭataññatra nenti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4076_0: Kappiyaṁ pana kātabbaṁ, na patteyeva kevalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4077_0: Pacchiyaṁ yadi vā kuṇḍe, kātuṁ vaṭṭati bhājane.
tika-vin10t1:4085_0: Byañjanaṁ vāpi yaṁ kiñci, patte tassākiranti ce.
tika-vin10t1:4087_0: Atirittaṁ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṁ tathā puna;
tika-vin10t1:4088_0: Yena taṁ akataṁ yaṁ vā, kātabbaṁ tena taṁ visuṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4093_0: Yopi pātova ekampi, sitthaṁ bhutvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t1:4110_0: Jānaṁ āsādanāpekkho, bhutte pācitti tassa tu.
tika-vin10t1:4112_0: Dukkaṭaṁ abhihāre ca, gahaṇe itarassa hi;
tika-vin10t1:4136_0: Mūlaṁ kandaṁ muḷālañca, matthakaṁ khandhakaṁ tacaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4137_0: Pattaṁ pupphaṁ phalaṁ aṭṭhi, piṭṭhaṁ niyyāsameva ca.
tika-vin10t1:4146_0: Saṅgahaṁ idha gacchanti, āhāratthaṁ pharanti hi.
tika-vin10t1:4148_0: Chaḍḍenti jaraṭṭhaṁ chetvā, yaṁ taṁ vajakalissa tu;
tika-vin10t1:4181_0: Sattannaṁ pana dhaññānaṁ, kaḷīro sāsapassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4199_0: Vatthulo cīnamuggo ca, ummā vajakalī tathā.
tika-vin10t1:4201_0: Jajjharī kāsamaddo ca, sellu siggu ca nāḷikā;
tika-vin10t1:4204_0: Rājamāso ca māso ca, nipphāvo migapupphikā;
tika-vin10t1:4217_0: Tathā pupphaṁ karīrassa, pupphaṁ varuṇakassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4237_0: Labujassa ca cocassa, mocassa madhukassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4263_0: Tālapiṭṭhaṁ tathā dhotaṁ, piṭṭhaṁ yaṁ khīravalliyā;
tika-vin10t1:4282_0: Bhojanaṁ sannidhiṁ katvā, khādanaṁ vāpi yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:4283_0: Bhuñjeyya vāpi khādeyya, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4286_0: Nidahitvā sace tassa, denti taṁ puna vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4289_0: Dutiye divase tassa, nihitaṁ taṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4303_0: Thullaccayena saddhiṁ dve, maṁse mānusake siyuṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4304_0: Sese akappiye maṁse, dukkaṭena saha dvayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4310_0: Dvīsu tesu vikappesu, dukkaṭaṁ pana vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin10t1:4330_0: Kālo yāmo ca sattāhaṁ, iti kālattayaṁ idaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4331_0: Atikkamayato doso, kālaṁ taṁ taṁ tu kālikaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4343_0: Gahitaṁ tadahe vāpi, dvayaṁ pubbaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4346_0: Iti vuttaṁ daḷhaṁ katvā, mahāpaccariyaṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:4349_0: Taṁ taṁ sakaṁ sakaṁ kāla-manatikkamma bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:4361_0: Viññāpetvā tathā taṁ ce, dukkaṭaṁ paṭigaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:4376_0: Yena yena hi viññattaṁ, tasmiṁ mūlepi tassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:4377_0: Laddhepi pana taṁ laddhaṁ, hotiyeva na aññathā.
tika-vin10t1:4385_0: Akappiyena vuttepi, sappinā deti tena ce;
tika-vin10t1:4402_0: Manusso vāmanusso vā, deti kāyādinā tidhā.
tika-vin10t1:4404_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti taṁ bhikkhu, dīyamānaṁ sace dvidhā;
tika-vin10t1:4407_0: Dāyako gaganaṭṭho ce, bhūmaṭṭho cetaro siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4411_0: Dātuṁ vāpi gahetuṁ vā, vinā hatthaṁ pasāritaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4414_0: Evarūpe pana ṭhāne, ṭhatvā ce deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4416_0: Pakkhī vā mukhatuṇḍena, hatthī soṇḍāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4417_0: Sace yaṁ kiñci pupphaṁ vā, phalaṁ vā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4423_0: Tena hatthaṁ pasāretvā, heṭṭhimaṁ pana bhājanaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4425_0: Paṭicchitabbaṁ taṁ eka- desenāpi ca bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4428_0: Tato paṭṭhāya taṁ sabbaṁ, oropetvā yathāsukhaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4429_0: Ugghāṭetvā tato iṭṭhaṁ, gahetuṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4432_0: Kājabhattaṁ haranto ce, onatvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4434_0: Tiṁsahattho siyā veḷu, antesu ca duve ghaṭā;
tika-vin10t1:4437_0: Bahupattā ca mañce vā, pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake;
tika-vin10t1:4438_0: Ṭhapitā dāyako hattha-pāse ṭhatvāna deti ce.
tika-vin10t1:4441_0: Nisīdati phusitvā yo, yañca pattesu dīyati.
tika-vin10t1:4443_0: Gahitaṁ tena taṁ sabbaṁ, hotiyeva na saṁsayo;
tika-vin10t1:4446_0: Gahitaṁ hoti taṁ sabbaṁ, āruhitvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t1:4447_0: Āhacca kucchiyā kucchiṁ, ṭhitā pattā hi bhūmiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4449_0: Yaṁ yaṁ aṅguliyā vāpi, phusitvā sūciyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4450_0: Nisinno tattha tattheva, dīyamānaṁ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4456_0: Na panetāni kāyena, paṭibaddhāni honti hi.
tika-vin10t1:4459_0: Khāṇubaddhepi vā mañce, gahaṇaṁ neva rūhati.
tika-vin10t1:4467_0: Sace patte rajo hoti, dhovitabbo jale sati;
tika-vin10t1:4470_0: Piṇḍāya vicarantassa, rajaṁ patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:4477_0: Asutvānādiyitvā vā, denti ce natthi dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4480_0: Sace rajaṁ nipāteti, mahāvāto tato tato.
tika-vin10t1:4482_0: Na sakkā ca siyā bhikkhaṁ, gahetuṁ yadi bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4485_0: Sāmaṇerassa taṁ datvā, dinnaṁ vā tena taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4486_0: Tassa vissāsato vāpi, bhuñjituṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4488_0: Bhikkhācāre sace bhattaṁ, sarajaṁ deti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4489_0: ‘‘Paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṁ tvaṁ, gaṇha vā bhuñja vā’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t1:4491_0: Vattabbo so tathā tena, kattabbañceva bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4492_0: Rajaṁ upari bhattassa, tassuplavati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:4495_0: Anto paṭiggahetabbaṁ, paviṭṭhaṁ tu sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:4497_0: Patitaṁ sukkhabhatte ce, apanīyāva taṁ rajaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4501_0: Thevo uḷuṅkato patte, sace patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4503_0: Bhatte ākiramāne tu, carukena tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:4504_0: Masi vā chārikā vāpi, sace patati bhājane.
tika-vin10t1:4509_0: Uppabhitvā sace patte, itarassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4512_0: Pāyāsassa ca pūretvā, pattaṁ ce denti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4513_0: Uṇhattā pana taṁ heṭṭhā, gahetuṁ na ca sakkati.
tika-vin10t1:4516_0: Na sakkā ce gahetabbo, tathā ādhārakenapi.
tika-vin10t1:4522_0: Ābhogaṁ pana katvā ce, nisinno hoti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4524_0: Sace hatthena muñcitvā, pattaṁ ādhārakampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4525_0: Pelletvā pana pādena, niddāyati hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4530_0: Tasmā taṁ na ca kātabbaṁ, bhikkhunā vinayaññunā;
tika-vin10t1:4531_0: Yaṁ dīyamānaṁ patati, gahetuṁ taṁ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4533_0: Bhuñjantānañca dantā vā, khīyantipi nakhāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4534_0: Tathā pattassa vaṇṇo vā, abbohāranayo ayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4537_0: Paññāyati hi taṁ tesu, siyā navasamuṭṭhitaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4539_0: Paṭiggahetvā taṁ pacchā, khāditabbaṁ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4540_0: Na paññāyati ce tasmiṁ, malaṁ vaṭṭati khādituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4545_0: Bhesajjatthāya tāpetvā, vāsiṁ khīre khipanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4546_0: Uṭṭheti nīlikā tattha, satthake viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t1:4548_0: Sace āmakatakke vā, khīre vā pakkhipanti taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4552_0: Patte patati ce toyaṁ, kiliṭṭhaṁ kāyavatthato.
tika-vin10t1:4555_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, rukkhamūlepi bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:4557_0: Sattāhaṁ pana vassante, deve suddhaṁ jalaṁ sace;
tika-vin10t1:4558_0: Abbhokāsepi vā patte, toyaṁ patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4563_0: Paṭiggahetvā vā pattaṁ, dātabbo tassa odano;
tika-vin10t1:4564_0: Chupitvā deti ce bhattaṁ, taṁ panuggahitaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4570_0: Sace vadati pacchā taṁ, paṭiggaṇheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t1:4573_0: ‘‘Etto pūvampi bhattaṁ vā, kiñci gaṇhā’’ti bhāsati.
tika-vin10t1:4579_0: Taṁpaṭiggahaṇe kiccaṁ, puna tassa na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:4588_0: Patitaṁ hatthato tasmiṁ, na karoti akappiyaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4591_0: Bhuñjitabbaṁ tu taṁ katvā, pattaṁ viya nirāmisaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4593_0: Sace yāgukuṭaṁ puṇṇaṁ, sāmaṇero hi dubbalo;
tika-vin10t1:4594_0: Bhikkhuṁ paṭiggahāpetuṁ, na sakkoti hi taṁ puna.
tika-vin10t1:4599_0: Atha vā bhūmiyaṁyeva, hatthe bhikkhu ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4600_0: Āropeti pavaṭṭetvā, tattha ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4603_0: Dve tayo sāmaṇerā vā, denti ce gahaṇūpagaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4606_0: Ekena vā tathā dinnaṁ, gaṇhanti dve tayopi vā.
tika-vin10t1:4612_0: Sammujjanto ca ghaṭṭeti, na panuggahitaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4615_0: Gaṇhitvā puna taṁ ñatvā, ṭhapetuṁ tattha vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4617_0: Vivaritvā sace pubbe, ṭhapitaṁ pihitampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:4618_0: Tatheva taṁ ṭhapetabbaṁ, kattabbaṁ na panaññathā.
tika-vin10t1:4620_0: Bahi ṭhapeti ce tena, chupitabbaṁ na taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4621_0: Yadi chupati ce ñatvā, taṁ panuggahitaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4627_0: Paṭiggahaṇakiccaṁ tu, tasmiṁ puna na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:4629_0: Tālaṁ vā nāḷikeraṁ vā, āruḷho koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t1:4633_0: Tamañño pana bhūmaṭṭho, gahetvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4635_0: Chinditvā ce vatiṁ ucchuṁ, phalaṁ vā deti gaṇhituṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4638_0: Sace na puthulo hoti, pākāro atiuccako;
tika-vin10t1:4641_0: Uddhaṁ hatthasataṁ gantvā, sampattaṁ puna taṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:4644_0: Bhikkhuno sāmaṇeraṁ tu, khandhena vahato sace;
tika-vin10t1:4645_0: Phalaṁ gahetvā tattheva, nisinno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4647_0: Aparopi vahantova, bhikkhuṁ yo koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t1:4648_0: Phalaṁ khandhe nisinnassa, bhikkhuno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4650_0: Gahetvā phaliniṁ sākhaṁ, chāyatthaṁ yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:4651_0: Puna citte samuppanne, khādituṁ pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4656_0: Kappiyaṁ pana kāretvā, paṭiggaṇhāti taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4660_0: Gacchanto antarāmagge, yaṁ icchati tato pana.
tika-vin10t1:4668_0: Taṇḍulesu hi khīṇesu, attanā gahitesu so;
tika-vin10t1:4672_0: Yāguṁ bhikkhussa taṁ datvā, sayaṁ pivati tassa ce.
tika-vin10t1:4680_0: Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṁ tu kāraṇaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4684_0: Na sakkoti sace te ca, taṇḍule bhājanampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:4695_0: Tatte panudake koci, ce pakkhipati taṇḍule;
tika-vin10t1:4696_0: Tato paṭṭhāya tenaggi, na kātabbova bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:4698_0: Paṭiggahetvā taṁ yāguṁ, pātuṁ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4699_0: Sace pacati pacchā taṁ, sāmapākā na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:4702_0: Tasseva ca tato laddhaṁ, phalaṁ kiñci na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4705_0: Kaṇṭake bandhituṁ vāpi, bhikkhuno kira vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4707_0: Saṇḍāsena ca dīghena, gahetvā thālakaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:4708_0: Pacato bhikkhuno telaṁ, bhasmaṁ patati tattha ce.
tika-vin10t1:4713_0: Paṭiggahetvā aṅgāre, tāni dārūni vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4716_0: Ucchuṁ khādati ce bhikkhu, sāmaṇeropi icchati;
tika-vin10t1:4717_0: ‘‘Chinditvā tvamito gaṇha’’, iti vutto ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t1:4728_0: Udakena samā vuttā, himassa karakāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:4729_0: Kūpādīsu jalaṁ pātuṁ, bahalampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4731_0: Khettesu kasitaṭṭhāne, bahalaṁ taṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:4732_0: Sanditvā yadi taṁ gantvā, nadiṁ pūreti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4735_0: Na ñāyati raso tesaṁ, na paṭiggahaṇakāraṇaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4738_0: Pakkhittāni sace honti, paṭiggaṇheyya taṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:4744_0: Ajānantassa pācitti, so ce visati khādato.
tika-vin10t1:4746_0: Sarīraṭṭhesu bhūtesu, kiṁ vaṭṭati? Na vaṭṭati?
tika-vin10t1:4750_0: Semhaṁ siṅghāṇikā kheḷo, assu loṇanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4752_0: Yaṁ panettha sakaṭṭhānā, cavitvā patitaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4753_0: Patte vā pana hatthe vā, paṭiggaṇheyya taṁ puna.
tika-vin10t1:4794_0: Udakaṁ dantaponaṁ vā, dentassa ca atitthiye;
tika-vin10t1:4795_0: Titthiyoti ca saññissa, dukkaṭaṁ vimatissa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4804_0: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci āmisaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4814_0: Pamāṇaṁ savane cevaṁ, ajjhokāse na cetare.
tika-vin10t1:4824_0: Sabhojane kule tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4833_0: Vītarāgesu vā tesu, nikkhantesu ubhosu vā.
tika-vin10t1:4839_0: Catutthe pañcame ceva, vattabbaṁ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:4840_0: Vattabbaṁ yañca taṁ sabbaṁ, vuttaṁ aniyatadvaye.
tika-vin10t1:4846_0: Bhojanānaṁ tu pañcannaṁ, vutto aññatarena yo;
tika-vin10t1:4849_0: Cārittaṁ tassa pācitti, aññatra samayā siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4858_0: Ṭhitaṭṭhāne sace bhikkhuṁ, oloketvā na passati;
tika-vin10t1:4861_0: Sace dūre ṭhito hoti, asanto nāma bhikkhu so;
tika-vin10t1:4862_0: Natthi ārocane kiccaṁ, gavesitvā ito cito.
tika-vin10t1:4864_0: Na doso samaye santaṁ, āpucchitvā ca gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:4865_0: Bhikkhuṁ gharena maggo ce, ārāmaṁ gacchatopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:4870_0: Idaṁ pana samuṭṭhānaṁ, kathinena samaṁ mataṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4878_0: Na paṭikkhipitabbā sā, ‘‘rogo dāni na me’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t1:4884_0: Tato aññehi vā bhiyyo, ācikkhitvā yathātathaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4894_0: Aññatra paccayā tassa, dukkaṭaṁ tu pade pade.
tika-vin10t1:4899_0: Ārohā pana cattāro, dve dve taṁpādarakkhakā;
tika-vin10t1:4900_0: Evaṁ dvādasaposo ca, eko hatthīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t1:4903_0: Eko sārathi yodheko, āṇirakkhā duve janā.
tika-vin10t1:4906_0: Cattāro padahatthā ca, purisā pattīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t1:4914_0: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṁ, sampattaṁ pana passati;
tika-vin10t1:4921_0: Ākāse iddhiyā seyyaṁ, pakappetu ca iddhimā;
tika-vin10t1:4931_0: Uyyodhikaṁ balaggaṁ vā, senābyūhampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4937_0: Sesesupi ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-vin10t1:4942_0: Piṭṭhādīhi kataṁ majjaṁ, surā nāmāti vuccati;
tika-vin10t1:4943_0: Pupphādīhi kato sabbo, āsavo hoti merayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4946_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4978_0: Nimujjeyyapi vā bhikkhu, ummujjeyya tareyya vā.
tika-vin10t1:4980_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4986_0: Yena yena panaṅgena, bhikkhuno tarato jalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:4989_0: Taruto tīrato vāpi, pācitti patato jale;
tika-vin10t1:4992_0: Pājentopi sace nāvaṁ, arittena phiyena vā;
tika-vin10t1:4993_0: Ussārentopi tīre vā, nāvaṁ kīḷati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:4995_0: Hatthena vāpi pādena, kaṭṭhena kathalāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:4998_0: Udakaṁ kañjikaṁ vāpi, cikkhallaṁ vāpi vikkhipaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5030_0: Disvā vā pana taṁ sutvā, mā vā bhāyatu, bhāyatu;
tika-vin10t1:5031_0: Itarassa tu bhikkhussa, hoti pācitti taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:5040_0: Jotiṁ tappetukāmo ce, jalāpeyya jaleyya vā;
tika-vin10t1:5041_0: Ṭhapetvā hoti pācitti, tathārūpaṁ tu paccayaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5043_0: Sayaṁ samādahantassa, yāva jālā na jāyati;
tika-vin10t1:5053_0: Anāpatti gilānassa, kataṁ aññena vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:5059_0: Apuṇṇe addhamāsasmiṁ, dese ce majjhime pana;
tika-vin10t1:5066_0: Dukkaṭaṁ atirekaddha- māse ca samayesu ca.
tika-vin10t1:5075_0: Cīvaraṁ yaṁ nivāsetuṁ, sakkā pārupitumpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5079_0: Yena kenaci kāḷena, kaddamenapi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:5084_0: Pāḷikaṇṇikakappo vā, na ca vaṭṭati katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:5085_0: Ekaṁ vāpi anekaṁ vā, bindu vaṭṭati vaṭṭakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5090_0: Kappe naṭṭhepi vā saddhiṁ, tena saṁsibbitesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:5101_0: Kappatettāvatā kāmaṁ, nidhetuṁ, na ca kappati.
tika-vin10t1:5110_0: Yassa kassaci nāmaṁ tu, gahetvā sahadhamminaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5115_0: ‘‘Tissassa bhikkhuno vā tvaṁ, tassā tissāya theriyā;
tika-vin10t1:5122_0: Puna tenapi vattabbaṁ, ‘‘ko te mitto’’ti bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:5127_0: Tissāya theriyā vā tvaṁ, santakaṁ paribhuñja vā;
tika-vin10t1:5128_0: Vissajjehī’’ti vā vutte, hoti paccuddhaṭaṁ puna.
tika-vin10t1:5130_0: Iccetāsu pana dvīsu, yāya kāyaci cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5134_0: Yena taṁ vinayaṁ kammaṁ, kataṁ panidha bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:5186_0: Dhovato pana pattaṁ vā, nibbāpentassa yāguyo.
tika-vin10t1:5188_0: Hatthena taṁ uḷuṅkena, gahetvā nhāyatopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5189_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:5201_0: Siñcane siñcanaṁ vuttaṁ, paribhoge idaṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:5203_0: Ayameva visesoti, tassa ceva panassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:5211_0: Vadatā pana taṁ kammaṁ, uccāletuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5213_0: Sace vippakate kamme, paṭikkosati taṁ puna;
tika-vin10t1:5219_0: ‘‘Adhammena ca vaggena, na ca kammārahassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:5220_0: Kata’’nti jānato natthi, doso ukkoṭane pana.
tika-vin10t1:5230_0: Āroceti sacaññassa, sopi aññassa vāti hi.
tika-vin10t1:5232_0: Evaṁ satampi bhikkhūnaṁ, sahassampi ca tāva taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5233_0: Āpajjateva āpattiṁ, yāva koṭi na chijjati.
tika-vin10t1:5245_0: Na ca chādetukāmo vā, sabhāgaṁ vā na passati.
tika-vin10t1:5255_0: Tassa pācittiyaṁ hoti, sesānaṁ hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5263_0: Muñcitvā pana taṁ bhikkhuṁ, gaṇo ce paripūrati;
tika-vin10t1:5264_0: Honti te sūpasampannā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:5266_0: Upajjhāyo sace hutvā, gaṇaṁ ācariyampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5267_0: Pariyesati pattaṁ vā, sammannati ca māḷakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5270_0: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīsu, kammavācāsu dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5283_0: Maggaṁ gacchati saddhiṁ yo, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5285_0: Gamane saṁvidhāne ca, vattabbo yo vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t1:5286_0: So ca bhikkhunivaggasmiṁ, vuttattā na ca uddhaṭo.
tika-vin10t1:5305_0: Kammaṁ kileso pāko ca, upavādo atikkamo;
tika-vin10t1:5311_0: Tikkhattuṁ tehi vattabbo, ye passanti suṇanti ca;
tika-vin10t1:5312_0: ‘‘Mā hevaṁ avacāyasmā’’, iti bhikkhūhi so pana.
tika-vin10t1:5315_0: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīhi, kammavācāhi dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5325_0: Saṁvaseyya ca bhuñjeyya, pācitti saha seyya vā.
tika-vin10t1:5327_0: Uposathādikaṁ kammaṁ, karoto saha tena hi;
tika-vin10t1:5331_0: Dadatopi tathā ekaṁ, bahūni ca bahūsvapi.
tika-vin10t1:5333_0: Ukkhittake nipannasmiṁ, itaro seti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:5334_0: Itarasmiṁ nipanne vā, paro seti ubhopi vā.
tika-vin10t1:5343_0: Nissaṭṭhoti ca taṁ diṭṭhiṁ, saññissosāritoti ca.
tika-vin10t1:5349_0: Tathā vināsitaṁ jānaṁ, upalāpeyya tena vā;
tika-vin10t1:5359_0: Na hettha kiñci vattabbaṁ, sabbaṁ uttānamevidaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5363_0: Vuccamāno hi bhikkhūhi, bhikkhu sikkhāpadena yo;
tika-vin10t1:5393_0: Kāretabbo tathā bhikkhu, yathā dhammo ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t1:5398_0: Evaṁ āropite mohe, yadi moheti yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:5399_0: Tasmiṁ mohanake vuttā, pācitti pana puggale.
tika-vin10t1:5411_0: Kuddho deti pahāraṁ ce, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5414_0: Dinne bhijjatu sīsaṁ vā, pādo vā paribhijjatu;
tika-vin10t1:5415_0: So ce maratu vā, mā vā, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:5418_0: Kaṇṇaṁ vā tassa nāsaṁ vā, yadi chindati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5426_0: Pahāraṁ deti mokkhādhi-ppāyo doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:5432_0: Iti vatvā panāyantaṁ, ‘‘gaccha re’’ti ca muggaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5433_0: Satthaṁ vāpi gahetvā vā, paharitvā tu yāti ce.
tika-vin10t1:5435_0: Anāpatti sace tena, pahārena matepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5442_0: Kāyaṁ vā kāyabaddhaṁ vā, uccāreyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:5445_0: Uggiritvā viraddho so, pahāraṁ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:5448_0: Sace tena pahārena, pahaṭassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:5449_0: Hatthādīsupi yaṁ kiñci, aṅgaṁ bhijjati dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5468_0: Hoti vācāya vācāya, pācitti pana bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:5475_0: Vikāle ca tayā bhuttaṁ, mā eva’’nti ca bhāsato.
tika-vin10t1:5481_0: Sace bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ, bhikkhūnaṁ pana bhikkhu yo;
tika-vin10t1:5484_0: ‘‘Yaṁ ime tu bhaṇissanti, taṁ sossāmī’’ti gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:5503_0: Dhammikānaṁ tu kammānaṁ, chandaṁ datvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:5504_0: Pacchā khīyati pācitti, vācato vācato siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5510_0: Ime kammaṁ karontī’’ti, ñatvā khīyati tassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:5517_0: Ṭhapitā ñatti vā niṭṭhaṁ, kammavācā na gacchati.
tika-vin10t1:5519_0: Etasmiṁ antare kammaṁ, kopetuṁ parisāya hi;
tika-vin10t1:5522_0: Adatvā jahite chandaṁ, tassa pācittiyaṁ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5523_0: Dhammakamme adhamme ca, vimatissa ca dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5528_0: Gilāno vā gilānassa, karaṇīye na dosatā;
tika-vin10t1:5535_0: Samaggena ca saṅghena, saddhiṁ datvāna cīvaraṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5536_0: Sammatassa hi bhikkhussa, pacchā khīyati yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:5539_0: Tikapācittiyaṁ dhamma- kamme vuttaṁ tu cīvaraṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5562_0: Dukkaṭaṁ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5563_0: Deviyā vāpi rañño vā, sace na viditāgamo.
tika-vin10t1:5584_0: Sace kappiyavatthuṁ vā, vatthuṁ vāpi akappiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5591_0: ‘‘Na vaṭṭatī’’ti vatvā taṁ, na nidhetabbameva tu.
tika-vin10t1:5594_0: Palibodho hi nāmeso, ṭhapetuṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5613_0: Dukkaṭaṁ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5615_0: Atha sambahulā gāmaṁ, vikāle pavisanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5618_0: Gacchanti ce tato aññaṁ, tato aññanti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5619_0: Puna āpucchane kiccaṁ, natthi gāmasatepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5622_0: Pavisanti sace aññaṁ, pucchitabbaṁ tu antarā.
tika-vin10t1:5624_0: Katvā kulaghare bhatta- kiccaṁ aññattha vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:5625_0: Sace caritukāmo yo, sappibhikkhāya vā siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5627_0: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṁ, passe ce bhikkhu labbhati;
tika-vin10t1:5628_0: Asante pana natthīti, gantabbaṁ tu yathāsukhaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5630_0: Otaritvā mahāvīthiṁ, bhikkhuṁ yadi ca passati;
tika-vin10t1:5636_0: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṁ, passe ce bhikkhu vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:5656_0: Kārāpane ca karaṇe, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5661_0: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, dukkaṭaṁ paribhuñjato;
tika-vin10t1:5668_0: Navaṁ mañcampi pīṭhaṁ vā, kārāpentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5675_0: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, dukkaṭaṁ paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:5681_0: Uttānaṁ vāpi aṭṭaṁ vā, bandhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:5684_0: Mañcaṁ vā pana pīṭhaṁ vā, tūlonaddhaṁ kareyya yo;
tika-vin10t1:5690_0: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, uddāletvā nisevato;
tika-vin10t1:5698_0: Dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā, tassa tisso dasā siyuṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5716_0: Cīvaraṁ bhikkhu kāreyya, karaṇe dukkaṭaṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5721_0: Dīghaso ca pamāṇena, nava tassa vidatthiyo;
tika-vin10t1:5724_0: Aññena ca kataṁ laddhā, sevato dukkaṭaṁ bhave;
tika-vin10t1:5731_0: Yo cantaragharaṁ bhikkhu, paviṭṭhāya tu hatthato;
tika-vin10t1:5732_0: Aññātikāya yaṁ kiñci, tassa bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t1:5740_0: Rathikāya sace ṭhatvā, deti bhikkhuni bhojanaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5741_0: Āpatti antarārāme, ṭhatvā gaṇhāti bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t1:5747_0: Vīthiyādīsu ce ṭhatvā, na doso paṭigaṇhato.
tika-vin10t1:5764_0: Gāmato nīharitvā vā, deti ce bahi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5780_0: Anāpattittano bhattaṁ, padāpeti na deti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5781_0: Tathā aññassa bhattaṁ vā, na dāpeti padeti ce.
tika-vin10t1:5783_0: Yaṁ na dinnaṁ taṁ dāpeti, na dinnaṁ yattha vāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5784_0: Tattha tampi ca sabbesaṁ, samaṁ dāpeti bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t1:5800_0: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5806_0: Nimantitassa vā bhikkhā, aññesaṁ tattha dīyati.
tika-vin10t1:5808_0: Gharato nīharitvā vā, denti ce yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:5811_0: Anāgate hi bhikkhumhi, gharato paṭhamaṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:5812_0: Nīharitvā sace dvāre, sampatte denti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5814_0: Bhikkhuṁ pana ca disvāva, nīharitvāna gehato;
tika-vin10t1:5819_0: Ārāmaṁ upacāraṁ vā, pavisitvā sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:5825_0: Tassa vā parivārampi, aññaṁ katvā bahuṁ pana.
tika-vin10t1:5827_0: Yāguyā viditaṁ katvā, pūvaṁ bhattaṁ haranti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5831_0: Haranti tena saddhiṁ ce, sabbaṁ vaṭṭati tampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5836_0: Yaṁ asaṁviditaṁ katvā, ābhataṁ pana taṁ bahi;
tika-vin10t1:5839_0: Gantvā vā antarāmagge, gahetabbaṁ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5864_0: Otāretvā nivatthabbaṁ, tato ūnaṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5870_0: Ubho koṇe samaṁ katvā, sādaraṁ parimaṇḍalaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5874_0: Tasmā ghare vihāre vā, kattabbaṁ parimaṇḍalaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5877_0: Gaṇṭhikaṁ paṭimuñcitvā, katvā koṇe ubho samaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5880_0: Tathā akatvā bhikkhussa, jattūnipi urampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5885_0: Hatthe piṇḍikamaṁsamhā, heṭṭhā pāde ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5888_0: Hoti so suppaṭicchanno, doso vāsūpagassa na.
tika-vin10t1:5891_0: Hatthaṁ vā pana pādaṁ vā, acālentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5898_0: Yattha katthaci hi ṭṭhāne, ekasmiṁ antare ghare;
tika-vin10t1:5901_0: Yo anādariyaṁ katvā, olokento tahiṁ tahiṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5923_0: Gacchato dukkaṭaṁ hoti, tatheva ca nisīdato.
tika-vin10t1:5925_0: Kāyaṁ bāhuñca sīsañca, paggahetvā ujuṁ pana;
tika-vin10t1:5932_0: Khambhaṁ katvā sasīsaṁ vā, pārupitvāna gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:5933_0: Dukkaṭaṁ muninā vuttaṁ, tathā ukkuṭikāya vā.
tika-vin10t1:5938_0: Dutiye ca catutthe ca, chaṭṭhe vāsūpagassa tu;
tika-vin10t1:5956_0: Yaṁ kiñci pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:5959_0: Sese thūpīkataṁ sabbaṁ, vaṭṭateva na saṁsayo.
tika-vin10t1:5961_0: Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṁ tu, gahetvā pattamekakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:5962_0: Pūretvā yadi peseti, bhikkhūnaṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5965_0: Orohati sace heṭṭhā, na taṁ thūpīkataṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5968_0: Dinnaṁ ayāvakālittā, na taṁ thūpīkataṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5971_0: Piṇḍapātaṁ sace denti, idaṁ thūpīkataṁ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5973_0: Bhattassūpari paṇṇaṁ vā, thālakaṁ vāpi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:5976_0: Paṭiggahetumevassa, taṁ tu sabbaṁ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5980_0: Paṭhamaṁ dutiyaṁ vutta-nayaṁ tu tatiye pana;
tika-vin10t1:5983_0: Aññesaṁ attano bhattaṁ, ākiraṁ pana bhājane;
tika-vin10t1:5987_0: Catutthe yaṁ tu vattabbaṁ, vuttaṁ pubbe asesato;
tika-vin10t1:5994_0: Yo bhiyyokamyatāhetu, sūpaṁ vā byañjanampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5998_0: Viññattiyaṁ tu vattabbaṁ, apubbaṁ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:5999_0: Aṭṭhame pana ujjhāne, gilānopi na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:6021_0: Mukhe ca sakalaṁ hatthaṁ, pakkhipantassa dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6022_0: Mukhe ca kabaḷaṁ katvā, kathetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6024_0: Vacanaṁ yattakenassa, paripuṇṇaṁ na hoti hi;
tika-vin10t1:6028_0: Vacanaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ ce, kathetuṁ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6032_0: Makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe vā, katvā bhuñjeyya dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6043_0: Katvā evaṁ na bhottabbaṁ, saddaṁ ‘‘suru surū’’ti ca;
tika-vin10t1:6044_0: Hatthanillehakaṁ vāpi, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6046_0: Phāṇitaṁ ghanayāguṁ vā, gahetvā aṅgulīhi taṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6053_0: Sāmisena tu hatthena, na ca pānīyathālakaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6057_0: Santako pana saṅkho vā, sarāvaṁ vāpi thālakaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6059_0: Tasmā na ca gahetabbaṁ, gaṇhato hoti dukkaṭaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6067_0: Chattaṁ yaṁ kiñci hatthena, sarīrāvayavena vā;
tika-vin10t1:6076_0: Satthapāṇī na hotāsiṁ, sannayhitvā ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t1:6079_0: Dhanuṁ sarena saddhiṁ vā, dhanuṁ vā sarameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:6083_0: Sace deseti saddhammaṁ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6086_0: Na gaṇhāti naro tāva, dhammaṁ deseyya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6094_0: Sabbattha agilānassa, yāne vā sayanepi vā.
tika-vin10t1:6097_0: Pīṭhe mañcepi vā ucce, nisinnena ṭhitena vā.
tika-vin10t1:6099_0: Na ca vaṭṭati desetuṁ, ṭhatvā vā uccabhūmiyaṁ;
tika-vin10t1:6102_0: Samāne vāpi ucce vā, nipanne neva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6116_0: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, dasame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:6119_0: Pañhaṁ pucchati ce thero, kathetuṁ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6124_0: Gacchato purato pañhaṁ, na vattabbaṁ tu pacchato;
tika-vin10t1:6127_0: Saddhiṁ uggahitaṁ dhammaṁ, sajjhāyati hi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6135_0: Tatiye natthi vattabbaṁ, catutthe harite pana;
tika-vin10t1:6138_0: Jīvarukkhassa yaṁ mūlaṁ, dissamānaṁ tu gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:6139_0: Sākhā vā bhūmilaggā taṁ, sabbaṁ haritameva hi.
tika-vin10t1:6147_0: Kato aharite ṭhāne, haritaṁ eti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6148_0: Siṅghāṇikā gatā ettha, kheḷeneva ca saṅgahaṁ.
tika-vin10t1:6154_0: Deve pana ca vassante, udakoghe samantato;
